CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Type__c, "Amendment"), SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c, IF(SBQQ__Quote__r.Contract_Type__c == "Ramp Contract", SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c, IF(SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c > 1, ((SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c * SBQQ__ProrateMultiplier__c) / SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c) * SBQQ__Quote__r.Initial_Term_Length__c, 1)))
CustomField.label: Initial Term Quantity
